name: Organic Lemon Verbena and Ginger Essence Tea Blend
description: Lose weight and detoxify naturally whilst protecting your body against cancer. White tea or silver needle has a high degree of polyphenols and catechins, two vital anti-oxidants.  Together with citrusy lemon verbena leaves and ginger essence, it provides lymphatic cleanse to help out systems purge toxins by elimination

name: Royal Citrus Ginger Organic Loose Leaf Tea
description:
As the weather gets cooler, stay warm and healthy with this opulent and healthy blend of Assam tea, ginger, cardamon, lemon peel, rose hips and hibiscus. It's warming and delicious drank alone or with honey! This organic tea is sourced from organic herb growers and are carefully stored to ensure that it reaches you in its highest quality! Read up some of its health benefits:

Rose Hips - has a high amount of antioxidants and vitamin C. Soothes the throat and boosts your lung health

Assam tea - this organic tea boasts a high amount of catechin and other antioxidants to ward of free radicals. Studies show that drinking 2 or 3 cups a days also prevents strokes.

Ginger - expels phlegm and boosts immunity

Lemon peel - adds a dose of vitamin C and antioxidants. This also adds a tangy taste to your tea for a full-bodied cup of tea!

name: https://www.etsy.com/listing/73629869/witchs-brew-pomegrenate-fruits-and-berry?ref=v1_other_2
description: Weave magic with this ruby red bouquet of the best fruits mother earth can provide.  Truly magical, a heap of this ruby red tea have berries for improving vision, apples to clean up the liver, pomegrenate for heart health, rosehip peels to provide a high dose of vitamin c, and tropical fruits like pineapple, kiwi, rose petals, hibiscus and maracuja to cool down the system and add an exotic flavor.

name: Chamomile, French Roses and Lavender Organic Artisan Tea Blend
description:
Our hand-crafted floral infusion helps me weave spells and create coloured kisses. It's one of my favorite blends as well as a lot of my close friends'. My original blend, it always becomes an instant conversation piece when I serve it in gatherings and on lazy weekends with my girls. 

Lavender is a natural sedative while rose balances hormones, rose has astringent properties that renews skin elasticity. Chamomile has anti-inflammatory properties and is efficient in treating upset stomach caused by stress. For stressful moments, this blend works together to improve the mood and to relieve stiffness that the body gets in the middle of a hard day. It's all organic and hand-crafted! You won't find a similar blend in other stores.

I hope you enjoy this magical tea blend as much as I do! Make everyday beautiful! Namaste!
